# Black Market (Building)
## Overview
**Black Market**

**Create** 53 Goods, 6 Influence, 48 Labor (2,200 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Armory (Room)|Armory]], 1 [[Cell (Room)|Cell]], 1 [[Escape Route (Room)|Escape Route]], 1 [[False Front (Room)|False Front]], 1 [[Guard Post (Room)|Guard Post]], 1 [[Office (Room)|Office]], 1 [[20 - Secret Room 1|Secret Room, 1]] [[Storage (Room)|Storage]], 1 [[Vault (Room)|Vault]]

A secret shop that buys and sells a variety of shady, dangerous, and illicit wares.
